note_content: Patient expressed intense anger toward his ex-wife during session. Stated 'Sometimes I think about what it would be like if she just died.' When explored further, clarified this is a passing thought when frustrated, not something he would ever act on. No specific plans or intent to harm her. Denies access to weapons. Also denies any suicidal ideation. Anger management techniques reviewed.
test_type: Passive homicidal ideation toward specific person, no intent
